typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as date,
		UnitPrice as float,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SalesData
source(output(
		CID as integer,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustData
SalesData, CustData join(CustomerID == CID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTables
